entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
